## waitForTestId() function

Search for an element with the given `data-testid` attribute.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function waitForTestId(page: Page, testId: string, { extraMessage, timeout, visible }?: WaitForTestIdOptions): Promise<ElementHandle>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  page | Page | puppeteer page object. |
|  testId | string | The test id to search |
|  { extraMessage, timeout, visible } | [WaitForTestIdOptions](./pentf.waitfortestidoptions.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;ElementHandle&gt;

Handle to the element with the given test ID.
